issue.title: [Rust] master fails due to use of "fXX::NAN"
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9494](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9494). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'm getting an error that no associated type exists.  Changing to "std::fXX::NAN" fixes the issue.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9494?focusedCommentId=17159449) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
I can't reproduce this now on my main machine.  I must have been using an old toolchain on my other machine.
